description:
Recruiting Session

Many of our sponsor are looking to hire more developers and EuroPython is the perfect place to reach out to many of them.

In this session, the sponsors will present themselves in short intros and you can then approach them directly in their sponsor virtual rooms (chat and Zoom) to discuss their offerings in more detail.
title: Find a new job - Sponsor Presentations
